item.title: EP 160 - Broken Handcuffs, Broken Dreams: The Mystery Of Mr. Morgan
item.itunes:title: Broken Handcuffs, Broken Dreams: The Mystery Of Mr. Morgan
item.description:
Today we take a look at two mysteries!

First off, can it really be considered an alien abduction if you WANT to go with them?

Then we look at the mystery of Charles Morgan. From the minute he ran into his home with broken handcuffs, telling a story of being kidnapped and drugged, there were already so many questions. Two months later the mystery only got more bizarre . . .

 

This is an excerpt from Dead Rabbit Radio EP 160 "Broken Handcuffs, Broken Dreams: The Mystery Of Mr. Morgan."

 

Subscribe and listen to Dead Rabbit Radio, the Daily Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime Podcast on Itunes, Stitcher, or where ever you listen to podcasts!

 

Full Episode On Libsyn: http://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-160-broken-handcuffs-broken-dreams-the-mystery-of-mr-morgan

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

 

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

LINKS:

Alien Abduction? Unsolved Case Of Man 'Who Disappeared After Building UFO' Reopened

https://www.express.co.uk/news/weird/940439/Alien-abduction-man-disappeared-after-built-UFO

 

The Man Who Went To Space And Disappeared

https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/yvwjkv/the-man-who-went-to-space-and-disappeared-the-story-of-granger-taylor

 

The Second Renaissance: Part I

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L0K6Cb1ZoG4

 

The Second Renaissance: Part II

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jNiO2sTe2wo

 

The Bizarre Death Of Charles Morgan

https://morbidology.com/the-bizarre-death-of-charles-morgan/

 

CHUCK MORGAN

https://unsolved.com/gallery/chuck-morgan/

 

Ecclesiastes

https://www.sparknotes.com/lit/oldtestament/section12/

 

Ecclesiastes 12:1-8

https://www.biblegateway.com/passage/?search=Ecclesiastes+12%3A1-8&version=NIV

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

 

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
